
{{alias}}
    The minimum biased base 2 exponent for a subnormal double-precision
    floating-point number. It is given by

    -(BIAS+(52-1)) = -(1023+51) = -1074,

    where `BIAS = 1023` and `52` is the number of digits in the significand.

    Examples
    --------
    > {{alias}}
    -1074

    See Also
    --------
